name: mrcepid-collecthsmetrics
title: CollectHsMetrics
summary: Calculates coverage stats for a single CRAM file based on a set of input intervals

inputSpec.name: cram_list
inputSpec.label: List of cram files to process in this instance

inputSpec.name: intervals
inputSpec.label: Interval array in GATK/Picard interval format

inputSpec.name: threads
inputSpec.label: number of threads available to this instance
inputSpec.help: Number of threads available to this instance.

inputSpec.name: output_file
inputSpec.label: File to output results to. Default name is coverage.txt.gz
